name: git-hex-createFixup
description: Create a fixup commit for a specified commit. REQUIRES: staged changes (run 'git add' first). The fixup will be auto-squashed during rebase.

repoPath.description: Path to the git repository (defaults to single configured root)

commit.description: Commit hash or ref to create fixup for (required)

headBefore.description: HEAD commit hash before the operation

headAfter.description: HEAD commit hash after the operation

targetCommit.description: Hash of the commit this fixup targets

summary.description: Human-readable explanation of what was done

commitMessage.description: The commit's subject line (first line of commit message)
